analysis.description:
BMSport.distributeAll (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#897-921) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Banker_Address.deposit.value(_com)() (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#909-910)

Reentrancy in BMSport.withdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#594-634):
	External calls:
	- _pID = BMBook.pIDxAddr_(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#600-601)
	- BMBook.getPlayerAddr(_pID).transfer(_totalInvestment) (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#609-610)
	External calls sending eth:
	- BMBook.getPlayerAddr(_pID).transfer(_totalInvestment) (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#609-610)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- gameStatus_ (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#610-613)

Reentrancy in BMSport.withdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#594-634):
	External calls:
	- _pID = BMBook.pIDxAddr_(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#600-601)
	- BMBook.getPlayerAddr(_pID).transfer(_totalWinnings) (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#626-628)
	External calls sending eth:
	- BMBook.getPlayerAddr(_pID).transfer(_totalWinnings) (/unique_chucks/24/0xd4616cbb5c26d39c858b9a963efa66d83747b244.sol#626-628)
	State variables written after the call(s):
